name: Anura's Journey
description:
- Help Anura get back up to the surface by helping them navigate through the well's underground system.

 - To move around use [W] [A] [D]

 - Use [space] to eat monsters.

 - Use  [W] to jump and squash enemies

 - There are snakes, cockroaches, and bee's to look out for and their boss, Anura is not strong enough to defeat the boss by themselves so you must get creative....

Bonus: There is a secret message hidden in the game, good luck.

 Hint: It's one word
